column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tonraq says : " Did you speak to Zaheer ? "
#Text=Korra says : " Yes .
#Text=" Lin says : " How ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " Zaheer does n't know how many of us there are , so we have the numbers advantage .
#Text=I say we split into two teams : Mako , Bolin and Asami will take the airship up to the temple .
#Text=Meanwhile , my metalbenders , Tonraq , Lin , and I will get in position below Laghima 's Peak .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Let go your earthly tether .
#Text=Enter the void .
#Text=Empty and become wind .
#Text=Empty and become wind .
#Text=" P'Li says : " The airbenders are secured .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Thank you , P'Li .
#Text=For everything .
#Text=" P'Li says : " Of course .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I want you to know : not one day went by in that prison when I did n't think of you .
#Text=" P'Li says : " The years apart only made my love for you stronger .
#Text=And deep down I knew you would find a way to get me out .
#Text=Just like you saved me from becoming that warlord 's killing machine when I was a girl .
#Text=You 've shown me what true freedom means .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " And after today , we 'll show the entire world what it means .
#Text=No more prisons , no more running .
#Text=" P'Li says : " I love you , Zaheer .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I love you too .
#Text="
